actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A resolution to provide an end to the persecution of religion and genocide in Equatorial Guinea.

summary.text: Condemns President-for-Life Francisco Macias Nguema of Equatorial Guinea and calls upon the United States Government to encourage countries with interests in that nation to employ their influence toward the end of eliminating persecution of religion and genocide in Equatorial Guinea.

titles.title: A resolution to provide an end to the persecution of religion and genocide in Equatorial Guinea.
